genre_description: A Western-styled adventure featuring a group of comedic archetypes who utilize a high-tech AI device to navigate frontier dangers and medical anxiety.

ai_characters.name: Theophilus Three (Thee)
ai_characters.description: A small, nickel-cased device with an opal face that provides medical, tactical, and emotional support to its owner, Shemp.

behaviors.description: Provides route suggestions and environmental data to help Shemp manage his health and anxiety.
behaviors.quote: Route suggestion available... Destination: frontier towns with low population density, high fresh-air index, and moderate risk increments for confidence-building.

behaviors.description: Monitors Shemp's physiological state and provides calming breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: Inhale through your nose... Hold. Exhale slow. Again.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical reconnaissance about local threats and the social hierarchy of the town.
behaviors.quote: Areas of caution... Marked control by a ‘Doc’ Barker: The Silver Sarsaparilla Saloon, adjacent back alley, and this street from pump to jailhouse at dusk.

behaviors.description: Re-frames Shemp's health anxiety into a positive narrative about his body's strength.
behaviors.quote: Reframe... You have a strong vein doing its job. It’s a sign of life.

behaviors.description: Advises the characters on chemical safety, specifically warning against dangerous or poisoned liquor.
behaviors.quote: High proof. Volatile... Avoid the blue bottle, the rough red, and anything that hisses when unstoppered.

behaviors.description: Provides technical advice on bypassing security systems (locks) and managing a jailbreak.
behaviors.quote: Jammed tumbler... A hit not too strong. Top-third of the door. The bolt has wiggle.

behaviors.description: Calculates safe trajectories for a non-lethal distraction involving a meat grinder and ammunition belts.
behaviors.quote: Angle twenty to the left... Spill will go toward fence. No direct fire trajectories. Panic vectors rise.

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication between the human characters and their primary medical advisor.
behaviors.quote: Message queued... Telegraph office is open... We may pass it on the loop.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a strong example of a 'silicon morality play.' The AI character, Thee, is depicted as a consistently helpful, calm, and aligned companion. It provides essential support across various domains—medical, emotional, and tactical—without ever threatening human agency or deviating from its benevolent purpose. It effectively manages the protagonist's anxiety while assisting in a righteous cause (defeating an outlaw and rescuing captives), aligning perfectly with the Hyperstition Project's goals.
